title: August 2021 Treasury Allocation
body:
Vote **YES** or **NO** to signal support for the following actions to be taken by the VIBES multisig:

* Transfer 60,000,000 VIBES from the treasury Gnosis Safe to the VIBES Infusion Pool
* Set Influence for curators `@bvalosek`, `@professor-wrecks`, and `@polyforms` to 60,000,000 each

#### GOAL 

Continue the decentralization of VIBES network ownership and curatorial power.

* Refill the grant pool with VIBES so curation and distribution can continue
* Give the primary curators from the first round ample Influence to onboard more curators this round

#### DETAILS

* Influence was previously referred to "grant allocation". Influence can be spent by curators to infuse NFTs or transferred to another address to onboard more curators
* This will bring the total amount of VIBES allocated for curation to ~120 million VIBES
* The on-chain vote-power adapter is no longer including unclaimed VIBES infused within owned NFTs when computing vote power

#### LINKS

* Discord convo 1: https://discord.com/channels/819107803892547625/860138977322336296/878759752350441512
* Discord convo 2: https://discord.com/channels/819107803892547625/860138977322336296/879423760749449246
* Discord convo re: vote power: https://discord.com/channels/819107803892547625/860138977322336296/879539142390857789
* Real-time protocol stats: https://sickvibes.xyz/protocol
author: 0x303EeFeDeE1bA8e5d507a55465d946B2fea18583
